account-information-updated: Something went wrong when editing your account information. Please try again later...
account-invalid-phone-number: It seems that the phone number you entered is not valid. Please verify the country code and phone number you've entered.
account-password-updated: Something went wrong when updating your password. Please try again later...
account-phone-number-already-used: Given phone number is already used by another account.
account-phone-updated: Something went wrong when updating your phone number. Please try again later...
account-phone-verification-already-in-pr: Please wait 10 minutes between each attempt to change your phone number
account-phone-verified: Something went wrong when verifying your phone number. Please try again later...
account-validation-link-not-found: No pending phone validation linked to this user found.
auth-connection: Incorrect email or password. Please verify your informations and try again.
auth-created: Something went wrong when creating the account... Please try again later...
auth-email-not-allowed: This email is not allowed on this platform
auth-email-not-confirmed: Please confirm your account by clicking on the link in the email we sent you to access the platform.
auth-password-recovery: It seems something wrong happened while reseting your password. Please try again later...
auth-password-recovery-email: It seems something wrong while sending mail. Please try again later...
auth-required: You must be logged to access the platform.
common-insufficient-credits: Your credit balance is too low. Please refill and try again.
common-passwords-must-be-provided: Both actual password and new password must be provided.
common-same-password: The new password is the same as the old one.
common-unexpected-error: Unexpected error occurred, please try again later...
renderings-project-not-ready: Can't launch a rendering if the project is not ready.
renderings-resume: An error occured while launching your rendering. Please try again later...
vm-create-server: It seems something wrong happened during the creation. Please try again later...
vm-not-enough-resources: The configuration needed for your virtual machine is not available at the moment. Please try again later...
